title: Typical
content:
Hello everyone. I'm new here....   
   
I saw a lot of good constructive comments and decided to see if I could get some help with a font I'm working on named "Typical". The face is pretty straight forward, hence the name. Let me know if anyone has any ideas.   
   
Thanks.   
   
-Jonathan   
   
 ![typical.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414183325im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/419.gif)
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Interesting patterns...I ised to draw comics in Superpaint... Ahh. The glorious old days, before postscript. I like the condensed LC version...I'm impressed by people making fonts with that amount of pixels...gee, I have to give it a try ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414183325im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
/R

Fun. The patterns remind me of the old-school   
Mac app, "Superpaint." It would be fun to see   
your patterns applied or explored...   
   
   
//joe
